external_games.name: Idle Champions - Classic Nordom Skin & Feat Pack

name: Idle Champions: Classic Nordom Skin & Feat Pack
summary: In this pack: Unlocks the Champion Nordom (if you don't already own them) Classic Nordom (Fourth Edition) Skin Classic Nordom (First Edition) Skin An Epic Feat for Nordom 7 Gold Nordom Chests 1 Guaranteed Shiny Equipment Card 6 Epic Blacksmithing Contracts 6 Epic Bounty Contracts
